common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Edit campaign name, promotion period, message, and budget (if the shop is whitelisted) of target campaign

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Budget setup is not supported for your shop.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The minimum daily budget requirement was not met.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have access to AMS features.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The seller commission operation is frozen.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The unique key for the current campaign.

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"YBdHyRj"},{"description":"

The name of the current campaign.

","name":"campaign_name","sample":"campaign a","type":"string","required":"False","key":"nWsWTnC"},{"description":"

The start time of the designated campaign, in seconds.

","name":"period_start_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":"False","key":"RdEyGxC"},{"description":"

The period end time of campaign, in seconds.

Can set 32503651199 (2999-12-31 23:59:59) represent of no limit.

","name":"period_end_time","sample":"32503651199","type":"timestamp","required":"False","key":"wWNkmXT"},{"description":"

Budget allocation toggle for the current campaign.


Note: TH not supported

","name":"is_set_budget","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":"False","key":"PZzJXkF"},{"description":"

Budget value set for the current campaign.


Note: TH not supported

","name":"budget","sample":"10000.0","type":"float","required":"False","key":"MSxnPsy"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_business","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WZaDBYy"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"iHRATDx"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"kZQYQbY"}]}
request_sample:
[{"type":"Payload","value":"{
	"campaign_id": 101,
	"campaign_name": "campaign a",
	"period_start_time": 1735660800,
	"period_end_time": 32503651199,
	"is_set_budget": true,
	"budget": 10000
}"},{"type":"Java","value":"Unirest.setTimeouts(0, 0);
HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ams/update_basic_info_of_targeted_campaign?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp")
.header("Content-Type","application/json")
.body("{
   \"budget\": 10000,
   \"campaign_id\": 101,
   \"campaign_name\": \"campaign a\",
   \"is_set_budget\": true,
   \"period_end_time\": 32503651199,
   \"period_start_time\": 1735660800
}")
.asString();"},{"type":"PHP","value":"<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ams/update_basic_info_of_targeted_campaign?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "budget": 10000,
    "campaign_id": 101,
    "campaign_name": "campaign a",
    "is_set_budget": true,
    "period_end_time": 32503651199,
    "period_start_time": 1735660800
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;
"},{"type":"cURL","value":"curl --location --request POST 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ams/update_basic_info_of_targeted_campaign?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
   "budget": 10000,
   "campaign_id": 101,
   "campaign_name": "campaign a",
   "is_set_budget": true,
   "period_end_time": 32503651199,
   "period_start_time": 1735660800
}'
"},{"type":"Python","value":"import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ams/update_basic_info_of_targeted_campaign?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "budget": 10000,
  "campaign_id": 101,
  "campaign_name": "campaign a",
  "is_set_budget": True,
  "period_end_time": 32503651199,
  "period_start_time": 1735660800
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.RPCRequest("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)
"}]
